name: vovk-monorepo
description: RESTful RPC for Next.js - Transforms Next.js into a powerful REST API platform with RPC capabilities.

scripts.test: npm --prefix test run generate && npm run lint-nofix && tsc --noemit && tsc --project ./packages/vovk-cli/tsconfig.json --noemit && npm run unit
scripts.unit: PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.unit:watch: PORT=3210 concurrently "sleep 30 && npm run test:unit:watch" "npm run serve:unit" --kill-others --success first
scripts.serve:unit: npm --prefix test run generate && npm --prefix test run build && npm --prefix test run start
scripts._patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts._minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts._BREAKING-major: npm t && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts._beta: npm t && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts._beta-notest: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts._beta-patch: npm t && npm version prepatch --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts._beta-minor: npm t && npm version preminor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts._BREAKING-beta-major: npm t && npm version premajor --preid=beta && npm run build && npm publish ./dist --tag beta && git push && git push --tags
scripts._release-explicit-version: npm t && npm version 2.0.0 && npm run build && npm publish ./dist && git push && git push --tags
scripts._version-and-publish: npm version --prefix ./packages/$PACKAGE $VERSION_TYPE --no-git-tag-version && git add ./packages/$PACKAGE/package.json ./packages/$PACKAGE/package-lock.json && TAG=$PACKAGE-v$(node -p "require('./packages/$PACKAGE/package.json').version") && git commit -m "$TAG" && git tag $TAG && npm run build && npm publish --prefix ./packages/$PACKAGE --tag=$NPM_TAG && git push && git push --tags
scripts.vpub:check-vars: if [ -z "$VERSION_TYPE" ] || [ -z "$PACKAGE" ] || [ -z "$NPM_TAG" ]; then echo 'Error: some vars are not set'; exit 1; fi;
scripts.vpub:commit-and-push: TAG=$PACKAGE-v$(node -p "require('./packages/$PACKAGE/package.json').version") && git commit -am "$TAG" && cd ./packages/$PACKAGE && npm publish --tag=$NPM_TAG && cd ../.. && git push && git push --tags

author: Andrii Gubanov
